meta.content: Education; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: LEAD: Because of a transcription error, a story last week on earth sciences weekends for Pleasantville High School students incorrectly quoted Dorna Schroeter, director of the Madden Outdoor Education Center in Kent Cliffs, Putnam County. Miss Schroeter said: ''The reason we may not have as much of a problem with acid rain here as compared to the Adironacks is because we have a lot of limestone deposits in the Taconic region, and limestone acts as a neutralizer, bringing down the level of acidity.

LEAD: Because of a transcription error, a story last week on earth sciences weekends for Pleasantville High School students incorrectly quoted Dorna Schroeter, director of the Madden Outdoor Education Center in Kent Cliffs, Putnam County. Miss Schroeter said: ''The reason we may not have as much of a problem with acid rain here as compared to the Adironacks is because we have a lot of limestone deposits in the Taconic region, and limestone acts as a neutralizer, bringing down the level of acidity.

Because of a transcription error, a story last week on earth sciences weekends for Pleasantville High School students incorrectly quoted Dorna Schroeter, director of the Madden Outdoor Education Center in Kent Cliffs, Putnam County. Miss Schroeter said: ''The reason we may not have as much of a problem with acid rain here as compared to the Adironacks is because we have a lot of limestone deposits in the Taconic region, and limestone acts as a neutralizer, bringing down the level of acidity.''
